mapper.insert: insert into board values (null,#{title},#{contents}, 0,now(), (select ifnull(max(group_no),0)+1 from board b) ,1,0,#{user_no})
mapper.select: select b.no,b.title,b.contents,b.hit,b.reg_date,b.group_no,b.order_no,b.depth, u.name from user u, board b where u.no=b.user_no order by group_no desc, order_no asc
